titles.title: A bill to allow tribal grant schools to participate in the Federal Employee Health Benefits Program.
Tribal School Federal Insurance Parity Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported by Senator Hoeven without amendment. With written report No. 116-54.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 135.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Tribal School Federal Insurance Parity Act
This bill allows schools that receive grants under the Tribally Controlled Schools Act of 1988 to participate in the Federal Employee Health Benefits program.
